me.Abhigya.core.util.bungeecord

Class MessagingUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.util.bungeecord.MessagingUtils

  • public class MessagingUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for sending plugin messages via BungeeCord.
